title: It’s the CIA
author: Issuator
content: It’s gotta be the CIA, right? Why would the creators have vanished off the face of the earth, unless they knew something bad about some very powerful people? My guess is something to do with Afghanistan.

replies.author: snnoopyDog_25
replies.content: What if the game has some kind of code inside? For nuclear launches or a secure passkey or something.

replies.author: Issuator
replies.content: Most likely you’re absolutely right. There must be something about weapons of mass destruction hidden within the game, somewhere. Or maybe there is information hidden in the victory screen… Which is why the game is so confusing to beat.

title: Who are they?
author: Daddylus
content: I’ve been wondering recently if these two guys are the key to solving it all… if we can find out who they are, maybe we can get in contact with them somehow.

replies.author: snnoopyDog_25
replies.content: Are you sure these aren’t 3D renders? I feel like I’ve seen better graphics in GTA vice.
